reviewTitle: Wonderful Family Outing! Highlight of our trip
review_details: Our whole family enjoyed this outing so much! Anthi and her crew were well prepared and knew so much and share all their knowledge with us! Our 9, 7 and 4 year old ALL enjoyed the trip! Anthi was great with the children and she even let them each be a "captain" and drive the boat! We experienced traditional Greek fishing, touched and learned about the fish, octopus, swam in the cove, saw the amazing Santorini sunset & had the most wonderful meal! 5 stars isn't even enough!
reviewFor: Santorini Traditional Fishing Experience with transportation

review_details: We came to the Bordeaux region and Saint Émilion for just a few days. We had 3 young kids with us and visited 4 Châteaus - this was by far our favorite and our kids favorite! It was well rounded ,personal and the wines are amazing and a great price !a must visit!
